description:
Showtime has renewed Homeland and The Affair. The pair of dramas, currently airing together on Sunday night, will get a respective fifth and second season in 2015.Showtime电视台宣布续订《国土安全》和《婚外情》。这两部美剧目前都在周日晚播出，他们将会在2015年分别迎来他们的第五和第二季。

Neither piece of news comes as much of a surprise. Homeland remains Showtime's flagship original, despite losing its Emmy darling status in recent seasons. And The Affair, opening to a strong critical reception, has been averaging nearly 4 million gross weekly viewers across platforms. Both shows will have the same episode count as their current seasons, with Homeland getting 12 and The Affair plotting 10.这两部美剧被续订是意料之中的。《国土安全》虽然在上一届艾美奖竞争失败，不过仍然是Showtime电视台原创剧中的佼佼者。而《婚外情》自从开播就获得了外界评论关注，平均每周收视人数有400万观众。两部美剧新季被续订集数和本季一样，也就是说《国土安全》第五季有12集，《婚外情》第二季有10集。

title: 《国土安全》第五季被续订
